description:
Vivi tries to escape the Holy Land Mary Geoise with Wapol while the injured Sabo also looks for a way to leave to deliver King Cobra’s message to Luffy and Vivi. Meanwhile, Imu orders the Five Elders to test a horrendous weapon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die erschütterte Welt! – Das Urteil des Herrschers und der Zug der Fünf Weisen!
Le monde tremble. Le souverain dispose, les doyens exécutent !
The World Is Shaken! The Ruler`s Judgment and the Five Elders` Actions!
Yuragu Sekai! Shihaisha no Shinpan to Gorousei no Shidou!
العالم يهتزّ! حُكم الحاكم وتحرّكات الشّيوخ الخمسة!
揺らぐ世界! 支配者の審判と五老星の始動!
